title: Story Bundle for Kids & Teens: Intriguing Short Stories for Youngsters
description: Charlie is out of school for the summer and starts a dog walking business to start learning the value of a dollar and ends up learning much more than he intended on.This is just a peak at one of the 17 amazing stories in this bundle.Parents will love the lessons their children learn from the endings!Kids love the friendly characters!Grandparents will definitely enjoy reading this book to their grandchildren!Check it out today and see for yourself.** Read it FREE as part of your PRIME or Kindle Unlimited membership **
author: Betty J. Byers
